source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Coaching skills for managers
items.headline: A guide to using coaching as a leadership skills development tool
objectives_summary: Understand what coaching is
Be able to identify when it is appropriate to use coaching and when it isn’t
Understand the benefits and the costs of taking a coaching approach

items.title: IT Management: Essential Principles and Skills

visible_instructors.title: S Drawdy
visible_instructors.name: S
visible_instructors.job_title: Providing Insight Into How Things Work

items.headline: Learn to be an indispensable and highly sought after manager in the high tech arena by following this practical course
objectives_summary: Understand the 3 Ps of IT Management
Spot areas that typically need the New IT Managers attention but are often overlooked
Understand how to ensure all reports are accurate

items.title: Leadership Styles and Corporate Culture

visible_instructors.title: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.display_name: Lawrence M. Miller, Institute for Leadership Excellence
visible_instructors.name: Lawrence M.
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Author & Leadership Coach

items.headline: Leadership Lessons from the Rise and Fall of Corporate Culture - Align Your Style to Your Company Life Cycle
objectives_summary: To recognize the requirements of different life cycle stages of growth and decline
To recognize the leadership styles and behavior associated with different stages of development.
To assess your own leadership style.

items.title: Managing Generational Conflict
items.headline: Powerful knowledge for managing & reducing conflict, increasing engagement & productivity, and turning customers to fans
objectives_summary: Upon completing this course, you will be able to:
Create a culture of greater inclusion and collaboration across different generations
Decrease workplace conflict and increase employee engagement and productivity

items.title: Creating a working environment based on RESPECT
items.headline: Equality, Diversity and Inclusion in the workplace
objectives_summary: understand what constitutes inappropriate behaviour in the workplace.
appreciate the effects of inappropriate behaviour on individuals and organisations.
understand why people may behave inappropriately

items.title: Business Administration for Your Business - BUS102
items.headline: MBA, Finance, Accounting, Marketing, Management, Strategy, Entrepreneurship, Sales, Human Resource, Business English
objectives_summary: The students could understand Introduction to MBA Basics.

items.title: Be A Better Manager 3 - Team Building Management Training

visible_instructors.title: Mark Timberlake
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Online Training Courses For Beginners
visible_instructors.name: Mark

visible_instructors.title: Stephen Mather
visible_instructors.job_title: MBPsS, BSc (Hons) Psych, MSc Organizational Psychology
visible_instructors.name: Stephen

items.headline: Business Management Training - Be A Better Manager - become a team building manager and improve your management skills
objectives_summary: You will learn how to become a manager that can build and manage teams
You will understand the importance of cohesive team interaction and vision to achieve your goals
You will learn how to motivate your team

items.title: PMI-ACP Practice Exams - PMBOK 6

visible_instructors.title: Joseph Phillips
visible_instructors.job_title: PMP, PMI-ACP, Project+, ITIL, PSM I, CTT+
visible_instructors.name: Joseph

items.headline: 300 PMI-ACP Practice Exam Questions on all aspects of the PMI-ACP Exam
objectives_summary: Be better prepared to pass the PMI-ACP exam

items.title: Learn MATLAB with Image Processing from scratch!
items.headline: Learn how to use MATLAB with this awesome toolbox of Image Processing. No previous experience required at all!
objectives_summary: First of all, you will learn how to code in MATLAB. After completing this course, you would have learnt so many MATLAB commands that picking up new commands will be a piece of cake for you.
You will learn all the theoretical concepts of Image Processing and their implementation in MATLAB
You will be able to develop your own Image Processing application-specific MATLAB programs.

items.title: Pharmaceutical Supply Management for Developing Countries
items.headline: How to Select, Quantify, Procure, Store and Distribute Essential Medicines and Medical Supplies. Pharmacy Supply Chain
objectives_summary: Understand the pharmaceutical industry
Pharmaceutical and healthcare needs in low and middle income countries
Detailled insight in all steps of the supply cycle (e.g. Specification, Quantification, Procurement, Storage, Use)

items.title: Leadership: New Manager Training for Technical Professionals

visible_instructors.title: LearnSmart LLC
visible_instructors.name: LearnSmart
visible_instructors.job_title: Smarter Training. Never Open a Textbook.

items.headline: Learn to establish yourself as a manager and lead your technical team to success. We are PDU Accredited.
objectives_summary: Inspire and encourage your technical team to get the best out of them in an effective and meaningful manner by delegating tasks and developing performance plans to set achievable goals for personal and professional development.
Become familiar with the responsibilities and challenges of being a manager, including how to lead and guide a team.
Master the arts of successfully facilitating meetings, appraising performance, providing feedback and resolving conflicts within your team and organization.

items.title: Leadership, management & entrepreneurship in the 21 Century
items.headline: Combining leadership, management & entrepreneurship skills, discover the 21 Principles of 21st Century Leadership.
objectives_summary: Learn how to be a 21st Century leader
Create an inspiring vision and powerful sense of purpose
Create and lead a high-performing team

items.title: ISTQB Foundation Level CTFL training for 2021 + 1000 QUIZ
items.headline: Complete Training + Reference book + Topic wise Quiz + Chapter Wise Quiz + NOTES : COMPLETE PACKAGE
objectives_summary: Topic Wise Explanation : each and every topic is explained and structured strictly based on Istqb syllabus
Topic Wise quiz: After going through the quiz you can evaluate your understanding with the corresponding quizzes (you will not get in any other course)
Chapter-wise quiz: After each chapter, some difficult quizzes are included, you will get a similar difficulty level question in the exam

items.title: Digital Transformation - Masterclass
items.headline: A complete course on digital transformation - 7+ hours of videos, assignments, cases studies, resources and interviews
objectives_summary: The 5 phases of the digital transformation roadmap
How to structure a digital transformation
What a digital transformation strategy really is

items.title: Product Management :Agile Requirements using Product Backlog

visible_instructors.title: Paul Ashun
visible_instructors.name: Paul
visible_instructors.job_title: CSM, Author-Scrum Productivity Books, CEO Pashun Consulting

items.headline: Learn to manage requirements as professional scrum product owner using user stories ( Business Analysis ,Scrum Master)
objectives_summary: Learn how to manage product backlog as part of an agile scrum team.
Explain what user stories are and how they will make your team or business more efficient
Learn what scrum is and why it is so powerful for producing high quality, user oriented and user friendly digital products.

items.title: Mastering ISO 9001:2015+Self-Assessment Tool
items.headline: Get ahead of the competition, quickly add highly valuable credentials to your resume that employers are looking for
objectives_summary: Understand the latest requirements of the ISO 9001 standard.
Implement or manage a quality management system based on the ISO 9001 standard.
Add value and improve processes within their organization.
